EmailTemplate.name: IPM Notify PL,DPL,FL and Gatekeeper TLD changed after Contract
EmailTemplate.subject: Attention Target Launch Date is changed for {!IPM_Project__c.IPM_Project_Name__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly: Attention {!IPM_Project__c.IPM_Project_Leader__c},{!IPM_Project__c.Deputy_Project_Leader__c},{!IPM_Project__c.IPM_Finance_Lead__c},{!IPM_Project__c.IPM_Project_Gatekeeper__c}, the Target Launch Date on {!IPM_Project__c.IPM_Project_Name__c} was changed from {!IPM_Project__c.Previous_Target_Launch_Date__c} to {!IPM_Project__c.IPM_Target_Launch_Dates__c}.
